title: Enhancing Instructional Practice Competencies: Aggression Management Training for Nursing Assistants Using Video Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify various aggression scenarios with 90% accuracy and select appropriate response procedures
Learners can improve self-efficacy and behavioral intentions in aggressive situations by over 40% through mastery learning
Learners can develop and present real-case-based aggression management protocols through PBL team activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
